parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the Gas Generator on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Returns whether the Gas Generator is turned on and receives power (0 for no, 1 for yes).

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: Returns whether the Gas Generator is flashing an error (0 for no, 1 for yes).

outputs.name: Pressure
outputs.description: Returns the pressure in the Gas Generator in kilo pascal (kPa).

outputs.name: Temperature
outputs.description: Returns the temperature in the Gas Generator in kelvin (K).

outputs.name: Setting
outputs.description: (Unknown) Affected by the Setting parameter.

outputs.name: RatioOxygen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of oxygen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioCarbonDioxide
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of carbon dioxide in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioNitrogen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of nitrogen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioPollutant
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of pollutant in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioVolatiles
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of volatiles in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioWater
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of water in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioNitrousOxide
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of nitrous oxide in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidNitrogen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid nitrogen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidOxygen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid oxygen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidVolatiles
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid volatiles in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioSteam
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of steam in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidCarbonDioxide
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid carbon dioxide in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidPollutant
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid pollutant in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidNitrousOxide
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid nitrous oxide in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioHydrogen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of hydrogen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioLiquidHydrogen
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of liquid hydrogen in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: RatioPollutedWater
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Returns the percentage ratio of the amount of polluted water in the Gas Generator.

outputs.name: Maximum
outputs.description: (Unknown) Returns 100.

outputs.name: Ratio
outputs.description: (Unknown) Returns 0.5.

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the Gas Generator is turned on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: PowerGeneration
outputs.description: Returns power production
